__e: My son has the best mind of anybody I have ever met, but he still couldn't get into Harvard Law School without my help.
Also, the ones we've encountered seem to demonstrate a higher intelligence, - but that doesn't mean we can't...
And you still don't seem to realise that you're speaking to a man of superior intellect.
I will make my money because I'm smart and I'm talented, not because you're repugnant.
You got your weapons, and your wolf, and I've got my brains and we both have...
I often told myself that nothing was impossible to us, with our intelligence and strength.
Only the street-smart can act smart here.
An intelligence was what she needed.
Then, as you put it, with his intelligence alerted...
